con:config.name: GetTestAccessToken-CredsParam
con:config.con:description: Using client creds as param instead of authorization header

con:config.name: GetTestAccessToken-WrongClient
con:config.con:description: A client whose valid provider is not loginbuddy

con:config.name: GetTestAccessToken-MultipleClientCreds
con:config.con:description: Providing client credentials as parameter and as authorization header

con:configuration.regEx: configuration type was not given or is not supported
configuration type was not given or is not supported
required client_id was not given or was provided multiple times

con:configuration.content: Invalid authorization header, no or multiple access_token found!
Invalid authorization header, it includes an unsupported scheme or otherwise invalid content!

con:config.name: ClientConfig-All
con:config.con:description: Getting all clients to restore them afterwards

con:config.name: ReplaceSingleClient-NoSelector
con:config.con:description: Failing due to sending a single client configuration when list is expected
